title: Fear Of Evil Eye Dua
description: Authentic supplications for Fear Of Evil Eye Dua
seoContent: Authentic invocations and supplications for Fear Of Evil Eye Dua. Derived from reliable sources including Hisnul Muslim.

items.title: Dua 244
items.arabic: ((إِذَا رَأَى أَحَدُكُم مِنْ أَخِيهِ، أَوْ مِنْ نَفْسِهِ، أَوْ مِنْ مَالِهِ مَا يُعْجِبُهُ [فَلْيَدْعُ لَهُ بِالْبَرَكَةِ] فَإِنَّ الْعَيْنَ حَقٌّ)).
items.translation: If you see anything of your brother that pleases you, or of his person or of his property [then ask Allah to bless him in it] for the envious eye is real.
